channel.title: Post-apocalyptic themed source, just for fun
channel.description:
[center][b]Messing around with a Post-Apocalyptic theme and here's just some media. The basics of what I'm making is a giant PvP server with other NPC's that scatter the land to either help or hurt you. Some you can trade with others just want to kill you (ex zombies) All skills play a vital role in making money and making items, armor, bows, amulets, runes, ect ect. Certain skills can only be trained in certain areas of the map, and getting to them can be very dangerous. PvMing is also apart of this as bosses drop loot that can only be obtainable through that boss. Stores usually have some cheaper items but all expensive items are dropped by monsters, obtained by a skill, or completing a clue scroll or getting a casket. I thought this was a nifty idea so I thought I would go with it. I hope to eventually learn a bit more java to add more advanced things. As right now I'm working on a couple quests that would be filled with horror. Leave suggestions or feedback below it isn't much, I'm just playing around with it, so don't be too harsh. lol [/b][/center]
[center][spoiler][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img903/3060/ca3a8a.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img910/9310/ubUQ0g.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img908/5777/GiiYZS.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img911/111/mfzJ2V.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img908/6051/qBBq1E.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img907/5213/rr794W.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img910/1893/izTj8h.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img633/2413/T3Grtl.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img908/7418/hKykGu.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img910/5997/T91lyO.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img907/3444/ENBsxL.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img633/3072/l2pwPh.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img903/9794/aSmCP7.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img905/4121/7YtAa5.png[/img]
https://gyazo.com/570fa1205a5134e45ba353dfb1e15d25
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img908/7972/2qHusV.png[/img] https://gyazo.com/0d68f6b453c4fbf3882110f43845227b
https://gyazo.com/47905114ab3d5718a783eea77f2e98c2
[u][b]aw hell yea, trying to make use of uncommon items[/b][/u] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img910/3686/nQgorX.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img910/1762/bw5uCd.png[/img]
LIKE OS buddy [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img908/3410/Dqu49j.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img903/1371/eyYKIf.png[/img] [/spoiler][/center]
[center]Keep in mind i made everything wild except the banks and some minigames, so PvP lovers thrive. I would appreciate all suggestions, and feedback. I know this isn't much but I just thought I'd throw this out there, and see what ideas people had. (I UPDATED MY SOURCE MAJORLY) Client and source, I still am going with the same idea.[/center]
[center][b]Will add more media as I continue[/b][/center]

item.title: Post-apocalyptic themed source, just for fun
item.dc:creator: @elmo88 elmo88
item.description:
@elmo88 wrote:

Looks nice man, best of luck. I see you took ideas from project outlast too, don’t quit this time though lol I want to actually play a server like this. RSPS is getting old and boring its time for a change. For me anyway, plz and thx

Read full topic

item.title: Post-apocalyptic themed source, just for fun
item.dc:creator: @Severeheadache Severeheadache
item.description:
@Severeheadache wrote:

Nice idea, just needs more content. I say add something like factions if you can, where each city is apart of a different faction and you can be friendly or neutral, or hostile with them. And you can or cant do trade with them, or will or will not be attacked by them. Also make sure there’s some way Pvmers and skillers can still play without getting demolished. good luck

Read full topic
